name: Krabby

evolution.description: Krabby can evolve into Kingler at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The River Crab Pokémon. Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s attack or damage bonuses cannot be decreased by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.
